author: Alfred Korzybski
message: There are two ways to slide easily through life: to believe everything or to doubt everything; both ways save us from thinking.
title: Thought of the day

author: Alfred Whitehead
message: The art of progress is to preserve order amid change, and to preserve change amid order.
title: Thought of the day

author: Winston Churchill
message: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
title: Thought of the day

author: Friedrich von Schiller
message: If you want to study yourself look into the hearts of other people. If you want to study other people look into your own heart.
title: Thought of the day
